channel.title: HuffPost - Breaking News, U.S. and World News

item.title: Next Battle Over Access To Abortion Will Focus On Pills
item.description: Use of abortion pills has been rising in the U.S. since 2000 when the FDA approved mifepristone — the main drug used in medication abortions.

item.title: A Record Number Of People Went Without An Adequate Supply Of Food In 2021, UN Says
